SELECT F_WTM_GET_EMP_ORG_NM(B.TENANT_ID, B.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, YMD) AS orgNm , A.YMD AS ymd , A.SABUN AS sabun , B.EMP_NM AS empNm , WORK_TYPE_CD AS workTypeCd , TIME_CD_MGR_ID AS timeCdMgrId , WORK_MINUTE AS workMinute , OT_MINUTE AS otMinute , OTN_MINUTE AS otnMinute , NONPAY_MINUTE AS nonpayMinute , PAY_MINUTE AS payMinute , LATE_MINUTE AS lateMinute , LEAVE_MINUTE AS leaveMinute , ABSENCE_MINUTE AS absenceMinute , HOLIDAY_YN AS holidayYn , SUB_YN AS subYn FROM WTM_WORKTIME_DAY_CLOSE A INNER JOIN WTM_WORKTIME_CLOSE C ON A.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID = C.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON C.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND C.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.YMD BETWEEN B.SYMD AND B.EYMD WHERE C.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID = ${worktimeCloseId}
AND A.YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{eYmd}, '-', '')
AND B.SABUN = #{searchKeyword} OR B.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY A.SABUN, YMD

SELECT WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID AS worktimeCloseId , CLOSE_NM AS closeNm , TENANT_ID AS tenantId , ENTER_CD AS enterCd , SYMD AS symd , EYMD AS eymd , CLOSE_YN AS closeYn , CASE WHEN F_WTM_NVL(CLOSE_YN, 'N') = 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE CONCAT('마감') END AS endImg , NOTE AS note FROM WTM_WORKTIME_CLOSE WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND (SUBSTR(SYMD,1,4) = #{sYY} OR SUBSTR(EYMD,1,4) = #{sYY}) ORDER BY WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID

SELECT A.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID AS worktimeCloseId , A.SABUN AS sabun , B.EMP_NM AS empNm , B.ORG_CD AS orgCd , F_WTM_GET_ORG_NM(B.TENANT_ID, B.ENTER_CD, B.ORG_CD, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')) AS orgNm , CONCAT('재생성') AS endImg FROM WTM_WORKTIME_MON_CLOSE A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.SABUN = B.SABUN WHERE WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID = #{worktimeCloseId} GROUP BY A.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID, A.SABUN
mapper.update: UPDATE WTM_WORK_CALENDAR C JOIN (SELECT B.WORK_CALENDAR_ID FROM WTM_WORKTIME_CLOSE A INNER JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND B.YMD BETWEEN A.SYMD AND A.EYMD WHERE A.WORKTIME_CLOSE_ID = #{worktimeCloseId}) N ON ( C.WORK_CALENDAR_ID = N.WORK_CALENDAR_ID) SET WORK_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' , UPDATE_DATE = now() , UPDATE_ID = #{userId}

INSERT INTO WTM_WORKTIME_CLOSE (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, SYMD, EYMD, CLOSE_NM, CLOSE_YN, NOTE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES
(#{tenantId}, #{enterCd} , #{item.symd} , #{item.eymd} , #{item.closeNm} , #{item.colseYn} , #{item.note} , now(), #{userId} )
